options.content:
**Warning** : This is a readonly dashboard, to customize it, make a copy using Save As option and change as needed


**NOTE** : Metric Extension required for Panel Redo Switches.  See EM Grafana Plugin Documentation

targets.rawQuery:
select o.database_name "Database_Name",
                o.characterset "Database_Character_Set",
                o.instance_name "Instance_Name",
                o.national_characterset "National_DB_Character_Set",
                o.global_name "Global_Name",
                o.log_mode "Archive_Log_Mode",
                o.banner "Version",
                o.default_temp_tablespace "Default_Temporary_Tablespace"
          from sysman.mgmt$db_dbninstanceinfo o
         where o.target_guid = (select target_guid from sysman.mgmt$target where target_name= $oem_gf_target_name )

select sysdate as time_sec, c.availability_status_code AS Status, c.availability_status as metric 
FROM sysman.mgmt$availability_current c
WHERE c.target_name = $oem_gf_target_name
AND c.target_type = $oem_gf_target_type;
targets.rawQueryPlaceholder:

<col1>,<col2>,<col3>..
from <your table>
where <your where clause> and cast(cast(<any time stamp column> as timestamp) at time zone UTC as date) >= $FROM_TIME_STAMP$ and cast(cast(<any timestamp column> as timestamp) at time zone UTC as date) <= $TO_TIME_STAMP$

targets.rawQuery:
select
<col1>,<col2>,<col3>..
from <your table>
where <your where clause> and <any time stamp column> >= $FROM_TIME_STAMP$ and <any time stamp column> <= $TO_TIME_STAMP$

select o.tablespace_name as "Tablespace_Name",
o.status as Status,
o.contents as "Contents",
o.extent_management as "Extent_Management",
o.allocation_type as "Allocation_Type",
o.segment_space_management as "Segment_Space_Management",
o.logging as "Logging",
(NVL(o.initial_ext_size,0)) as "Initial_Extent",
(NVL(o.next_extent,0)) as "Next_Extent",
(NVL(o.increment_by,0)) as PERCENTAGE_INCREASE,
DECODE(o.max_extents,null,'UNLIMITED',TO_CHAR(max_extents)) as MAX_EXTENT,
o.min_extents as MIN_EXTENT,
(NVL(o.min_extlen,0)) as MIN_EXTEND_LENGTH,
o.block_size as BLOCK_SIZE,
TO_CHAR(NVL(o.bigfile,'NA')) as BIGFILE
from sysman.mgmt$db_tablespaces o
where o.target_name =  $oem_gf_target_name
     and o.target_type = $oem_gf_target_type
order by tablespace_name asc
